name: 18 Wheels of Steel Collection #1
description:
Look’s like we’ve got us a convoy! This collection’s haulin’ the first four games in the iconic 18 Wheels of Steel series. Tie down your cargo, buckle up and hit the open road, just be careful you don’t get a speeding ticket from the county sheriff.

Games included in this bundle:
  • 18 Wheels of Steel: Hard Truck
  • 18 Wheels of Steel: Across America
  • 18 Wheels of Steel: Pedal to the Metal
  • 18 Wheels of Steel: Convoy
